Documentation

Keep the learning simple.

Available for offline use.

Overview

Layout elements are just made to help you build layouts. Containers, Navmenu, Banner and a new way to use Flexbox, with classes.

Containers

Containers are the most basic layout element, he just apply a 10px padding to your elements to get start quickly building your app.

Neptuno has two types of containers: default container and container compressed.

Note: Padding of 10px applied.

 <div class="container" >
	<!-- Content here -->
 </div>

Compressed Container

Compress all text of elements, change class="container" to class="compressed".

Navmenu

A customizable and responsive navmenu build only with pure CSS and is mobile friendly.

  • Home
  • Components
  • Interface
  • Forms
  • Docs

<nav class="menu">
	<label for="target" class="icon-bar">
		<span></span>
	</label>
	<input type="checkbox" id="target">
	<ul class="menu-items">
		<li class="active"><a href="#">Home</a></li>
		<li><a href="#">Components</a></li>
		<li><a href="#">Interface</a></li>
		<li><a href="#">Forms</a></li>
		<li><a href="#">Docs</a></li>
	</ul>
</nav>

Shadow

Add class="shadow-1" to add shadow in navmenu.

	...

Responsive

add class="responsive" to make a responsive menu.

  • Components

Sidenav

Add class="sidenav" to make a sidenav menu.

<nav class="menu responsive sidenav">
	<input type="checkbox" id="target">
	<label for="target" class="icon-bar">
		<span></span>
	</label>
	<ul class="menu-items">
		<li class="active"><a href="#">Link 1</a></li>
		<li><a href="#">Link 2</a></li>
		<li><a href="#">Link 3</a></li>
	</ul>
</nav>

Customize

You can customize navmenu using this selectors.

nav.menu {
	background-color: #f5f5f5;
	--gray: #909090;
}

ul.menu-items li.active {
	background-color: var(--gray);
}

ul.menu-items li:not(.active) > a {
	color: #000;
}

ul.menu-items li:hover,
ul.menu-items li:hover a {
	background-color: var(--gray);
}

ul.menu-items li:hover a {
	color: #fff;
}

Customize

Use this selectors to customize banner

.banner {
	background: #f5f5f5;
}

.banner > .title {
	color: #777;
}
